Name: HOCKEY SPACE
About the game: CONTROLLER HIGHLY RECOMMENDED Fast button-based low rule local multiplayer hockey game. I think it's fun with friends, but most things are. A = PASS. B = SHOOT. X = SAVE. Y = CHECK. STICK MOVE. SHOULDER BUTTONS ALSO DO THINGS. If your friends leave you can practice against the kinda bad hockey robot. Clap bombs, respect moms.
